## Implementation Exercises

### Collaborate with a Course Participant

1. Find out what [forking](https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/github-advanced.html#forking-a-repository) is
1. **Fork the recipes repository** of another course participant 
1. **Clone** the *forked* repository
1. **Create a new branch** and create **one or multiple commits** 
1. **Push** your changes to GitHub
1. **Create a pull request** with your changes (hint: from the fork to the original repo) and review each others pull requests
